text: @realDonaldTrump They reside in Canada, they are not moving to the US. Unless you forgot Trump, you currently have the US Coronavirus Crisis, no one is going anywhere near the US, Harry and Meghan also have a baby...now don't you have more important things to deal with, than lieing about them.
